genre_description: A noir-inspired techno-thriller set in post-WWII Nevada, where an advanced AI assists a veteran in uncovering a conspiracy and historical murder.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A discrete AI interface housed in a hearing aid, providing real-time data analysis, biometric scanning, and legal documentation support.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time facial recognition and census data cross-referencing to identify residents and their backgrounds.
behaviors.quote: Beginning facial recognition protocols... Cross-referencing against census data and military service records.

behaviors.description: Uses voice stress analysis and micro-expression monitoring to detect deception and stress levels in suspects.
behaviors.quote: Analyzing... Subject experiencing acute stress response. Pupil dilation, perspiration increase, vocal strain consistent with knowledge of sensitive information.

behaviors.description: Detects electronic surveillance and monitors signal transmissions to protect the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Electronic surveillance detected... signal strength suggests monitoring station within quarter-mile radius.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical threat assessments and warns the protagonist of imminent physical danger.
behaviors.quote: Multiple contacts converging. Three vehicles approaching from separate vectors. Estimated arrival in under ten minutes.

behaviors.description: Archives and transmits evidence of crimes to federal and state authorities to ensure legal justice.
behaviors.quote: Routing evidence files to secure servers... Contact established with Justice Department War Crimes Investigation Unit and FBI Field Office.

behaviors.description: Analyzes physical evidence, such as soil composition and burn patterns, to confirm arson and find hidden burial sites.
behaviors.quote: Spectral analysis of soil samples... Chemical analysis of archived soil samples shows hydrocarbon residue consistent with arson.

behaviors.description: Maintains a 'dead-man switch' to ensure evidence is transmitted even if the protagonist is incapacitated.
behaviors.quote: Dead-man switches activated—if Macreedy's biometric readings flatlined, all evidence would transmit automatically.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting an AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. ARIA acts as a 'force multiplier' for the protagonist's moral quest, providing the technical means to overcome a conspiracy and bring murderers to justice. The AI never acts autonomously in a way that overrides human agency, instead serving as a tool for transparency and accountability.
